pullRequest.title: GEODE-7897: Run Redis integration tests against native Redis via Docker
pullRequest.bodyText: Configures relevant integration tests to also run against native Redis via a Docker image. Intended to help find discrepancies between Geode Redis behavior and that of native Redis.

beforeCommit.message: Adds ignoreOnWindowsRule to all acceptanceTests that start Redis in a docker container

afterCommit.message: GEODE-7897 Run Redis integration tests against native Redis via Docker

nodes.bodyText: Can we please get a Jira ticket created to track these todos?
